body: $AAPL Is favoured to have peaked against the March 2022 cycle low and is now pulling back.  It has declined in 5 waves from recent peak, a bounce in 7 waves is now favoured before resuming lower.  #Elliottwave #Trading #stocks

$AAPL was analyzed by 52 analysts. The buy consensus is at 84%. So analysts seem to be very confident about $AAPL. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/quote/AAPL/analyst-ratings?utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=ANALYST&utm_content=AAPL&utm_campaign=social_tracking

links.title: No College Degree? Apple, Tesla And More Companies Say 'No Problem'
links.description: As a general rule, going to college provides more opportunities than not. At the same time, the cost of higher education is increasing and some would-be university students are essentially priced out of attending. Researchers at Georgetown University discovered that from 1980 to 2019, the cost of college increased by 169%, while the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland estimated median income in the U.S.
